eint.h File Reference
External Interrupts (EINT)
#include <stdint.h>
#include <dev/eint.h>
#include "periph.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

int eint_open (port_t port)
 Open the external interrupt.
 
int eint_close (port_t port)
 Close the external interrupt.
 
int eint_getattr (port_t port, eint_attr_t *attr)
 Get the attributes for the external interrupt.
 
int eint_setattr (port_t port, const eint_attr_t *attr)
 Set the attributes for the external interrupt.
 
int eint_setaction (port_t port, const eint_action_t *action)
